long_description: Panther Martin Copper 6PK is very effective on trout, bass, perch, pickerel, crappie and many other species.  True copper blades.  6 New Classic Copper Killers in 3 Colors and 2 sizes - 3 in 1/8oz. & 3 in 1/4 oz.
